courses.title: Basic Contact Management
courses.summary: Explore the Contacts section at the heart of Act! Learn to create, edit and manage contacts.
courses.copy: Let's take a look at the heart of any CRM software, the Contacts section. In this course, you'll learn how to create, manage and interact with the contacts in your Act! Database.

data.title: Discovering the Basics
data.copy: Introducing the Act! Contact record, discover how to best navigate the Contacts section of Act!

data.title: Creating a Note
data.copy: Now that we've learned how to navigate around the Contact record - let's look at adding notes so we can keep tabs on our contacts.

data.title: Creating History Records and Viewing the History List
data.copy: Recording the interactions we have with our customers is the most important duty of a CRM, let's explore how Act! makes it easy to make history.

data.title: Adding a Document
data.copy: Let's look at attaching external files to our database, from invoices to images - keeping everything in one place means you can organize with ease.

courses.title: Advanced Contact Management
courses.summary: We take a deeper dive into the features available for managing contacts.
courses.copy: We take a deeper dive into the features available for managing contacts.

data.title: Using the Web Info Tab
data.copy: Monitor your contacts activities on the internet - from right inside Act! Customizable web links that dynamically use your data will help you look things up fast.
